Nos. 2,138 and 2,139. THE STATE OF MONTANA ex rel. MICHAEL DONLAN, Relator, v. THE SECOND JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, IN AND FOR THE COUNTY OF SILVER BOW et al., Respondents. Mr. Geo. F. Shelton, Mr. Bernard Noon, and Mr. C. F. Kelley, for Eelator. Mr. T. J. Walsh, for Eespondents.
